bluetooth_confirm.title: PVVX custom display control
bluetooth_confirm.description:
This is a control-only integration for devices running PVVX firmware:
- Writes custom display (Big/Small/Icons) via GATT
- Creates no sensors and coexists with BTHome

Device: {name} ({address}).

user.title: Add PVVX Display
user.description: Enter the device address to enable custom display control (no sensors, BTHome-friendly).
